lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old nephew of the former heavyweight champion Trevor Berbick has been charged with killing him, the police in Kingston, Jamaica, said yesterday. Harold Berbick and Kenton Gordon, an 18-year-old, were charged Thursday and scheduled to appear in court yesterday, Constable Courtney Gibbs said. The body of Berbick, 51, was discovered last Saturday in a church courtyard in his home parish of Portland, about 80 miles east of Kingston, Jamaica’s capital.
